issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead
Field requires API level 23 (current min is 21): `android.view.View#SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_LIGHT_STATUS_BAR`
Attribute `drawableTint` is only used in API level 23 and higher (current min is 21)
Attribute `drawableTint` is only used in API level 23 and higher (current min is 21)

Use `ResourcesCompat.getDrawable()`
Use `ResourcesCompat.getDrawable()`
Use `app:drawableLeftCompat` instead of `android:drawableLeft`
Use `app:drawableTint` instead of `android:drawableTint`
Use `app:drawableStartCompat` instead of `android:drawableStart`
Use `app:drawableTint` instead of `android:drawableTint`
Unnecessary; SDK_INT is always >= 21
